plot: After a broccoli invasion, the fruit must battle in an arena of death. But Orange is a lover, not a fighter. Can he and Passion escape their cruel fate together?

Under the oppressive Broccoli regime, two of each kind of fruit are chosen to fight to the death every year in the arena. Orange and Passion find that what might save them is not their fighting skills but their ability to fake being in love.—Annoying Orange

After a broccoli invasion, the fruit must battle in an arena of death. But Orange is a lover, not a fighter. Can he and Passion escape their cruel fate together? Under the oppressive Broccoli regime, two of each kind of fruit are chosen to fight to the death every year in the arena. Orange and Passion find that what might save them is not their fighting skills but their ability to fake being in love.—Shannon Jones
